name: Prosciutto
description: Pinsa topped with tomato sauce, Fior di Latte mozzarella, Prosciutto di Parma and Arugula.

name: Salsiccia & Porcini
description: Pinsa topped with tomato sauce, Italian sausage, Porcini mushrooms and our homemade Fior Di Latte Mozzarella.

name: Nduja
description: Pinsa topped with corbarino tomatoes, Straciatella mozzarella, Nduja salami, cured purple onions and basil.

name: Bolognese
description: mortadella, pistachio crema, straciatella cheese and pistachio crumble on toasted bread.

name: Panino Caprese
description: fresh Fior di Latte mozzarella, tomatoes, basil, and extra virgin olive oil on toasted bread .

name: Siciliano
description: Italian Sausage, caramelized onions, torched caciocavallo cheese, roasted eggplant and peppers on toasted bread.

name: Romano
description: smoked pecorino cream, prchetta and salsa verde on toasted ciabatta bread.

name: Tiramisu
description: Classic Italian dessert made with layers of coffee-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone cream.

name: Limoncello Cannoli
description: Crispy pastry shells filled with sweet lemon ricotta cream.

name: Torta Della Nonna
description: Almond flour cake with lemon curd filling and powdered sugar.

name: Ricotta Pistachio Cake
description: Fluffy cake with Ricotta Pistachio filling and powdered sugar.
